description:
Luffy`s battle with Don Chinjao heats up, Franky learns the tragic truth behind Dressrosa`s mysterious toy population, and Robin and Usopp prepare to join their little friends in battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hikari to Kage - Dressrosa ni Hisomu Yami!
Light and Shadow! Darkness Behind Dressrosa!
Ombre et lumière. La part obscure de Dressrosa !
Свет и тьма! Темная сторона Дресс Роуз!
النور والظل! الظلام المختبئ في دريسروزا!
光と影 ドレスローザに潜む闇!
